credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Horace W. Frost
title: Thakur Bakhtawar Singh, Seated on an Elephant with two Attendants, in Procession with Numerous Retainers on Foot
medium: opaque watercolor on paper, heightened with gold and silver
description: watercolor glued to backing sheet, many fragments, seems stable
inscriptions: u.r. in ink: [calligraphic inscription]; verso center in pencil: 55 [encircled]; verso center in blue ink: No 11 [crossed out in pencil]
